channel.title: [317] Need a bit of help-Picture inside![317]
channel.description:
Alright, I need a few questions, the picture says it all...
[img]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/883/oook0.png[/img]
As you can see, the Dragon Claws look a bit powerful don't you think?? I'd like them to be less powerful, how do i do that?
Also can you see that my shield is still weilded? How can i fix when i weild the claws the Shield comes off as well.
Thanks

item.title: [317] Need a bit of help-Picture inside![317]
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Ok thanks ill try that, TO TV!! COUGH! =P

item.description:

Make the claws 2h
umm, look for the special void and change the hits ^.^
